description: This course is designed to challenge pre-service teachers to use their knowledge, expertise and experience to design learning environments that will engage students in the learning process and cater for a variety of learning styles. Focusing on curriculum content and instructional approaches to teaching of junior secondary school business studies; draws knowledge and perspectives from fields of economics, accounting and management studies.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or entry to Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
